alert.note: Alert for Kauai East; Kauai North; Koolau Windward; Niihau; Oahu North Shore; Olomana (Hawaii) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Surf Advisory issued October 19 at 3:11PM HST until October 20 at 6:00PM HST by NWS Honolulu
info.description: ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY FOR NORTH FACING SHORES OF NIIHAU KAUAI OAHU MOLOKAI AND MAUI THROUGH 6 PM HST THURSDAY... .A short- to medium-period north swell (350 degrees) will continue to build overnight, peak Thursday, then gradually diminish Thursday night and Friday. ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM HST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Surf 12 to 16 feet. * WHERE...North facing shores of Niihau Kauai and Oahu. * WHEN...Until 6 PM HST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Moderate. Expect strong breaking waves, shore break, and strong longshore and rip currents making swimming difficult and dangerous.
info.instruction: Beachgoers, swimmers, and surfers should heed all advice given by ocean safety officials and exercise caution.

area.areaDesc: Kauai East; Kauai North; Koolau Windward; Niihau; Oahu North Shore; Olomana
